text:
So if you're anything like us, the past week or so of your life has essentially revolved around refreshing the Kardashian/Jenner Instagram and Twitter pages to spot any new clues which might confirm the rumours that Kylie, Khloé and Kim are all expecting babies early next year.

While Kim did her bit for the world, and appeared to confirm (via a clip of the upcoming 10th anniversary year of Keeping Up With The Kardashians) earlier this week that she and Kanye West are expecting their third child using a surrogate, we're still kind of in the dark about Kylie and Khloé.

Khloé may well have been giving us hints since June that she and boyfriend Tristan Thompson have been cooking up a baby, but we've still not got the cold, hard proof we need until now. Likewise with Kylie Jenner and the rumoured baby she's made with boyfriend of five months, Travis Scott.

But the eagle eyes over at Bustle think they might just have spotted something significant over on Kim Kardashian's Instagram page. And it's this, my friends:

In a cryptic photo posted back on September 3rd (about three weeks before speculation over Kylie being pregnant broke) Kim wrote the caption: "The 3 of us..." alongside a picture of herself, Kylie and Khloé. Errrrr, if this is not a secret message hidden within then I don't know what is.

Bustle spotted the post, writing: "It looks like the biggest clue may have been hiding in plain sight". And we're with them on that.

"The Instagram... feels a little too spot-on to be merely a coincidence," the theory continues, adding: "The Kardashians rarely do anything without intention, so it seems nearly improbable that Kim just so happened to post a snapshot of the three of them just weeks before all this baby news surfaced, and as the internet well knows, that ellipsis can speak volumes."

I mean, I'm convinced. But I guess it still doesn't act as like, actual, definite confirmation. So I'll just have to go back to refreshing all their social media pages and watching the first episode of the new season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians this weekend like a hawk.

Follow Cat on Twitter.
title: Did Kim just subtly confirm all three Kardashian pregnancies?
